item.title: Large van parked, 31st August
item.description:
A large truck used for commercial business keeps parking on the corner of the road which means that there have been a huge number of near misses with cars turning left out of Lovelace Avenue and cars coming from the left up oxhawth crescent. It’s a very selfish place to park as nobody can see through the van and having to take a wider line this risking hitting upcoming cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oxhawth Crescent, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roundabout tree, 31st August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough, London

item.title: Road safety issue - zebra crossed painted over, 31st August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 362, Shooters Hill Road, Charlton, London
